abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Energy Efficiency
            Global Environment Facility (GEF) Project for Bulgaria is to
            support a large increase in energy efficiency (EE)
            investments in Bulgaria through development of a dedicated,
            self-sustaining and market-based finance facility (BEEF).
            The BEEF, supported EE investments shall provide sustainable
            reductions in greenhouse gas emissions. The main change is a
            reallocation of funds between categories, namely US$
            342,112.39 thousand from category 3 (b) others of
            'consultants services and training' to category
            (1) sub-loans under part B of the project. This reallocation
            is required as assistance to BEEF for financing projects in
            their pipeline since they have exhausted all funds
            originally allocated to them under category (1) under part B
            of the project. Sub-loans have been prepared and loan
            documents will be signed before the closing date.
